basics.name: 张翔宇
basics.label: 博士生，强化学习，智能通信
basics.summary: 我是东南大学的博士生，目前的研究方向是强化学习、智能通信。掌握通信，信号处理，智能算法等方面的基础理论，具有较强的数学基础和编程能力，约50000行代码经验。 通过AI和5G的结合，我相信未来的沟通将彻底改变人类社会和人们的生活方式。

education.institution: 南京电子技术研究所（中电14所）

Project.name: XXX Large-scale underwater array system
keywords: My work focus on reducing the Calculated amount and improving the resolution.

Project.name: Underwater weak target detection technology
keywords: I focused on analysing the feature of target signal and proposed a method to improve the sonar detecting ability

publications.name: Xiangyu Zhang
publications.summary: ROBUST DIRECTION-OF-ARRIVAL ESTIMATION BASED ON SPARSE ASYMPTOTIC MINIMUM VARIANCE

publications.name: Xiangyu Zhang
publications.summary: Wideband Signal DOA Estimation Based on Sparse Asymptotic Minimum Variance
